titleStmt.title: A most godly sermon preached at St. Albons in Woodstreet on Sunday last being the 10 of October, 1641 : shewing the necessity of selfe-denyall and humiliation by prayer and fasting before the Lord in regard of the present plague we now lye under : which God in his good time remove from amongst us / by ... Henry Burton.
titleStmt.author: Burton, Henry, 1578-1648.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
